OWASP BeNeLux Days Conference 2022

by OWASP Foundation

Location

This Owasp BeNeLux Days Conference 2022 will be taking place at Achmea:


Spoorlaan 298
5017 JZ Tilburg
The Netherlands.

Parking information

  • Paid parking on Thursday in Tivoli parking space (a parking space close to the Interpolis / Achmea Venue). To reach the venue, look for the OWASP Flags
  • Free parking on Friday in Interpolis / Achmea parking space, which is located under the Interpolis / Achmea office
